response.original_title: In the Realm of the Gods
response.overview: A young man works as ritual dancer for religious ceremonies and performances. Though his daughter is impressed with his skills and vocation, he struggles to make ends meet. He must come to terms with dancing like a god but living like a pauper. Starring Tshering Dorji (actor from Hema Hema) in one of his early roles, the film screened in the Five Flavours film festival (Poland) and the Fukuoka Asian Film Festival (Japan)
response.title: In the Realm of the Gods
